attr.title: Tamashii
attr.desc: An ancient entity seeking help, a Witch, an unnamed soul and a Twisted Temple. A dark tale about inner discoveries set in a distorted and perverted world.
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1026400/TAMASHII/ and copy game.exe into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1026400/TAMASHII/) and copy game.exe into gamedata folder.
